alert.note: Alert for Claiborne; Copiah; Franklin; Jefferson; Lincoln (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 06 at 7:59PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Claiborne, northwestern Lincoln, Jefferson, northeastern Franklin and western Copiah Counties through 845 PM CDT... At 759 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Red Lick to near West Lincoln. Movement was northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... West Lincoln around 805 PM CDT. Port Gibson, Pattison and Vaughn around 815 PM CDT. Peyton around 820 PM CDT. Loyd Star around 825 PM CDT. Hermanville around 830 PM CDT. Brookhaven around 835 PM CDT. Wesson, Beauregard and Rocky Springs around 845 PM CDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
